metadata.title: CVE-2024-30045 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability exists in .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0where a stack buffer overrun occurs in the .NET Double Parse routine.

criterions.comment: dotnet7 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
dotnet8 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
